name: Point Of Impact With Aaron Hale

episodes.title: How Lydia Uncovered the Truth About the Cult She Was Raised In
episodes.description:
In this episode, Aaron Hale sits down with Lydia Knight to hear her powerful story of growing up in a cult and how she eventually discovered the truth about herself and her life. Lydia shares how studying psychology helped her understand the dynamics of control, trust, and trauma, leading her to deep healing and transformation. She also offers insights into how we can confront fear, begin to heal from trauma, and reclaim our personal truth.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
